parameters: 病院
\n<Lyric>"..."

Inside a building, Lyric slouched in a chair, looking
listless.
\n<Ameria>"Sorry to keep you waiting, Lyric."

\n<Lyric>"You're slow. Why make me wait like this? It makes no
sense."

\n<Ameria>"Can't be helped. We can't just let people come and go
freely."

\n<Lyric>"Even so, the identity check is overkill. We should get a
pass on sight."

\n<Ameria>"It took so long because Lyric is an unidentified suspicious
person..."
\n<Ameria>"Anyway, let's hurry. We're way past the scheduled time."
\n<Lyric>"Yeah, yeah."
The two began to walk.
Then, unexpectedly, Lyric stopped and gazed out the window.
\n<Ameria>"What are you doing?"
\n<Lyric>"Just thinking... what nice weather."
\n<Ameria>"Huh... What's that about? Are you feeling ill?"
\n<Lyric>"Are you picking a fight?"
The two started walking again.

\n<Ameria>"But you know, it feels like it's been a while since we've
had a peaceful chat. We've been on edge for so long."

\n<Lyric>"True. But we need to stay alert. There are weirdos out
there who'd want to kidnap and buy you."
\n<Ameria>"Weirdo is a bit harsh..."
\n<Ameria>"But yeah, that was a shock... Who would want to buy me?"

\n<Lyric>"Who knows. Anyone who'd go after someone as pint-sized as
you must be a real pervert."

\n<Ameria>"You've been making fun of me this whole time..." Ameria
puffed up her cheeks.

\n<Ameria>"But I've reported the slave trader's name to the empire. If
they catch someone with that name, they should let us know.
I'll ask about it then."
\n<Lyric>"Hmm, and what's the name of this slave trader?"
\n<Ameria>"Let's see, the name is--"
\n<Ameria>"A man named Riolaro."
\n<Lyric>"Hmm, Riolaro, Riolaro..."
前作のフラッシュバック
\n<Lyric>"--Huh"
\n<Ameria>"...? What's wrong? Do you know something?"
\n<Lyric>"..."
\n<Lyric>"No, I don't know anything. How could I possibly know that?"
\n<Ameria>"Right, of course. Haha."
\n<Ameria>"--Ah, this is the room. Here we are, Lyric."
In front of the room, Ameria knocked on the door.
\n<Woman's voice>"--Please come in."
The response came, and Ameria opened the door.
Inside was a sickroom, with Roselitte sitting on the bed.
\n<Roselitte>"Ameria, Lyric. Thank you for coming."

\n<Ameria>"Roselitte-san, good after--noon! Your Highness the Crown
Prince!" Ameria froze in surprise.

\n<Yuri>"No need to be so formal. I've heard all about it from
Roselitte. Just talk naturally as you would with her; it's
fine by me."
\n<Ameria>"Yes, yes! Thank you very much!"

\n<Lyric>"I'm not one for formalities either, so don't worry about
it."
\n<Ameria>"Lyric, you should show a little more respect!"
Roselitte and the others chuckled softly.
\n<Ameria>"Roselitte-san, are your injuries all better now?"

\n<Roselitte>"Yes. It doesn't hurt as long as I'm not moving around too
much. Besides, I won't be fighting for a while."
\n<Ameria>"That's good to hear."

\n<Lyric>"You're exaggerating, Ameria. She's totally fine now.
Despite acting like she was on death's door, she's bouncing
around just fine."
\n<Roselitte>"Lyric... please, don't say that..."

\n<Lyric>"Nope—I'll say it, and I'll keep saying it until I die. You
emotional scam artist."
Lyric slapped Roselitte on the head.
\n<Roselitte>"Ouch...!?"
\n<Ameria>"Ah!? You idiot!!"
Ameria pressed a cross against Lyric.
\n<Lyric>"Aaaaaaaaah!!?"
Lyric writhed in agony and rolled into the hallway.
\n<Ameria>"Are you okay, Roselitte-san!? "

\n<Roselitte>"I-I'm fine. It was just a light hit, and it wasn't where
I'm injured..."
\n<Ameria>"You're such an idiot! What if it had gotten worse!?"

\n<Lyric>"It was just a light poke! I took way more damage than
that!"
しばらく談笑が続く。
\n<Ameria>"...Ah, look at the time. We should be getting back soon."
\n<Roselitte>"Ah, that's true... Thank you both for coming today."
\n<Ameria>"No problem at all. Don't worry about it."

\n<Lyric>"Plus, we get to eat something delicious when we go out to
town."
\n<Ameria>"Lyric, really... Come on, we're leaving now?"
\n<Lyric>"Yeah."

Ameria headed towards the door. However, Lyric stayed
behind, looking at Yuri.
\n<Yuri>"...Hmm? What's up?"

\n<Lyric>"Ah, no. It's just rare to see someone important from the
human world. Just taking a last look, you know?"

\n<Yuri>"I see. Well, I'm not much to look at, but feel free to
stare to your heart's content."
\n<Lyric>"Right. Sleeping with royalty sounds like fun."
\n<Yuri>"What--"
\n<Ameria>"Hey, Lyric! That's rude!"
\n<Lyric>"Ow ow ow! Stop pulling, you idiot!"

\n<Ameria>"Well then, Roselitte-san. And Your Highness the Crown
Prince. We'll come visit again."
\n<Lyric>"Next time, prepare some sweets or something for us."
Ameria smacked Lyric on the head.
\n<Roselitte>"Hehe. Sure, I'll have some ready for you."
\n<Roselitte>"--Ah, both of you"
\n<Ameria>"What's wrong?"
\n<Roselitte>"...Um..."
\n<Roselitte>"You... you can come anytime. I'll let the doctor know."
Ameria and Lyric exchanged glances and smiled.
\n<Ameria>"Yeah, got it."
\n<Lyric>"Don't cry from loneliness, okay~"
The two left the sickroom.
\n<Yuri>"You've got some amusing friends."
\n<Roselitte>"Yes, they are precious friends to me."
\n<Yuri>"I see."

\n<Yuri>"So that was the succubus you were talking about. She
doesn't look like a demon at all."
\n<Roselitte>"Yes. She's quite a troublesome demon."
\n<Yuri>"I see."
\n<Yuri>"Roselitte, may I have a moment?"
\n<Roselitte>"Yes...?"

\n<Yuri>"You will be laying down your sword for a while, but you are
still a knight of Valam."

\n<Yuri>"Even now, will you fulfill your duties as a knight for the
empire, for His Imperial Majesty, and... for me?"
\n<Roselitte>"..."
\n<Roselitte>"Of course. My life is for the empire."
\n<Yuri>"I see... I'm relieved."

\n<Yuri>"I apologize for the suddenness, but... I have an important
mission I want to entrust to you. Will you accept it?"
\n<Roselitte>"Yes, of course."
\n<Yuri>"Good.... It's about that succubus from earlier."
\n<Roselitte>"...Lyric's?"

\n<Yuri>"Yes. This mission was something I had asked 'another
knight' to do, but... I want you to carry it out."
\n<Yuri>"The mission is--"
\n<Yuri>"Kill the succubus who possesses Begi-Ade."
\n<Roselitte>"..."
\n<Roselitte>"...Heh, Your Majesty. You jest..."
\n<Yuri>"Roselitte"
Yuri looked straight into Roselitte's eyes and said.
\n<Yuri>"Kill Lyric."
